name: Persona + CJM Example
description:
A template of Persona + CJM which I made for my study project of Food Delivery App. Made in Russian, but you can rewrite it completely, and make your own UX-artefacts.


Lesson about creating (Russian):


Customer Journey Map (CJM). UX-дизайн, FigJam - YouTube


Портрет пользователя (Персона). Google таблицы, FigJam - YouTube
